 17 /**
 18  * Abstract interface description for a Layer.
 19  *
 20  * @class Abstract interface description for a layer.
 21  */
 22 bigshot.Layer = function () {
 23 }
 24 
 25 bigshot.Layer.prototype = {
 26     /**
 27      * Returns the layer container.
 28      *
 29      * @type HTMLDivElement
 30      */
 31     getContainer : function () {},
 32     
 33     /**
 34      * Sets the maximum number of image tiles that will be visible in the image.
 35      *
 36      * @param {int} x the number of tiles horizontally
 37      * @param {int} y the number of tiles vertically
 38      */
 39     setMaxTiles : function (x, y) {},
 40     
 41     /**
 42      * Called when the image's viewport is resized.
 43      *
 44      * @param {int} w the new width of the viewport, in css pixels
 45      * @param {int} h the new height of the viewport, in css pixels
 46      */
 47     resize : function (w, h) {},
 48     
 49     /**
 50      * Lays out the layer.
 51      *
 52      * @param {number} zoom the zoom level, adjusted for texture stretching
 53      * @param {number} x0 the x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the top-left tile in css pixels
 54      * @param {number} y0 the y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the top-left tile in css pixels
 55      * @param {number} tx0 column number (starting at zero) of the top-left tile
 56      * @param {number} ty0 row number (starting at zero) of the top-left tile
 57      * @param {number} size the {@link bigshot.ImageParameters#tileSize} - width of each 
 58      *                 image tile in pixels - of the image
 59      * @param {number} stride offset (vertical and horizontal) from the top-left corner
 60      *                 of a tile to the next tile's top-left corner.
 61      * @param {number} opacity the opacity of the layer as a CSS opacity value.
 62      */
 63     layout : function (zoom, x0, y0, tx0, ty0, size, stride, opacity) {}
 64 };
 65
